name: Jack-O-Coloring Challenge
description:
Jack-O-Coloring was made for One Minute Game Jams 8 

I was only able to build the Easy mode for in time for this Gamejam, but selecting a difficulty is a requirement before you can play the game.  So make sure to just click the Easy button! 

The game involved coloring in a Jack-O-Lantern design and will score you on how accurately you do it.  But you also only have 1 minute to do it! 

Some pretty cool features in this game:

  • Online leaderboard system
  • Game option to let you choose a different pen color
  • Pumpkin designs are stored remotely and will be able to be updated, without you having to redownload the game!

This is very much a prototype and I was unable to get the other difficulties built in time for the game.  The game does access a webserver in order to download the pumpkin images and for the leaderboards, so Windows Firewall might ask for access! 

Enjoy & Have fun!
